instruction.value: Administer in the morning and evening.
Start treatment during the evening of Day 1 and last dose during morning of Day 15. Administer in the morning and evening.

AdditionalNotes.value: Monotherapy. Treatment cycle of 14 days of treatment followed by 7 day rest period. If ANC is greater than or equal to 1.5 X 109/L AND Platelets are greater than or equal to 75 X 109/L: Give as ordered. If ANC is less than 1.5 X109/L OR Platelets are less than 75 X 109/L: Delay 1 week. Dosage adjust for renal impairment (Cycle #1 ONLY): If CrCl is greater than 50 mL/minute: NO dosage adjustment. If CrCl is 30 to 50 mL/minute: Reduce dose to 75%. If CrCl is less than 30 mL/minute: DO NOT TREAT. Recommend rounding dose to a "dispensable" dose amount.
